blueprint.description: Installs FFmpeg (a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert, and stream audio/video) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [FFmpeg](https://www.ffmpeg.org/) is the leading multimedia framework. It is able to decode, encode, transcode, mux, demux, stream, filter and play pretty much anything that humans and machines have created. It supports the most obscure ancient formats up to the cutting edge.
blueprint.name: FFmpeg
blueprint.title: FFmpeg
